attributes.action: Abolish State help of Benifits to Single parent who have made it their choice to be Single
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I urge the govenment to ABOLISH the state benifits that are paid to single parents who have made it their own choice in live to be seperate from their spouses. I also believe that the country wouldnt be in the state that it is in at the moment if it wasnt for the benifits that were paid out un nessicerly
